name: Andhra Murukulu
description: This traditional Indian savory snack is specially prepared during festivals or served as a tea-time snack. This savory is originally made out of rice flour base.

name: Butter Murukulu
description: Butter Murukku recipe or Benne Chakli - light, crunchy, delicious, buttery festive snack made with butter, rice flour & other ingredients.

name: Senagalu
description: Senagalu or Chick Peas is very healthy and tasty. Senagalu are an excellent source of Protein, Fibre, Niacin, Iron, magnesium.

name: Pulihora
description: Pulihora is stomach filling, extremely delicious for its tangy, sour and salty taste. It is extremely flavorful that comes from the fresh curry leaves,dry red chilies and green chilies.

name: Masala Cashew
description: Made with BIG flavor, these homemade masala cashews are crunchy, salty, spicy, and majorly addictive. Spiced cashews are the perfect savory.

name: Chekkalu
description: Chekkalu are a traditional fried snack from Andhra pradesh that are crunchy, delicious and addictive. These are made in most Telugu speaking homes.
